detectors.description:
EnglishAuction.bid() (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2AC85972E6538175B4bFD738E15ac8BFdE64F119_EnglishAuction.sol#91-109) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp >= startTime,Auction not started) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2AC85972E6538175B4bFD738E15ac8BFdE64F119_EnglishAuction.sol#93)
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp < endTime,Auction ended) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2AC85972E6538175B4bFD738E15ac8BFdE64F119_EnglishAuction.sol#94)
	- endTime - now < 900 (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2AC85972E6538175B4bFD738E15ac8BFdE64F119_EnglishAuction.sol#102)
